parameters.query:
-- OPTIMIZED: Get user context efficiently
SELECT 
  ubc.*,
  -- Recent patterns
  COALESCE(rp.patterns, '[]'::json) as recent_patterns,
  -- Effectiveness history
  COALESCE(pe.effectiveness, '{}'::json) as pattern_effectiveness
FROM user_behavioral_data ubc
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT json_agg(pattern_data) as patterns
  FROM (
    SELECT pattern_data
    FROM learned_patterns
    WHERE user_id = '{{ $json.body.userId }}'
    ORDER BY effectiveness_score DESC
    LIMIT 5
  ) p
) rp ON true
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT json_object_agg(pattern_type, effectiveness_score) as effectiveness
  FROM pattern_effectiveness
  WHERE user_id = '{{ $json.body.userId }}'
) pe ON true
WHERE ubc.user_id = '{{ $json.body.userId }}'
